sentences.en: (= came in large amounts ) through the windows.
A brilliant shaft of sunlight burst through the doorway.
sentences.cn: 一束耀眼的阳光从门口照射进来。

sentences.en: A ray of sunlight thrust out through the clouds.
sentences.cn: 一缕阳光透过云层照射下来。

sentences.en: All colour fades— especially under the impact of direct sunlight.
sentences.cn: 所有颜色都会褪色——尤其是在阳光直射下。

sentences.en: He blinked in the bright sunlight.
sentences.cn: 他在强烈的阳光下直眨眼睛。

sentences.en: He used his left hand as a shield against the reflecting sunlight.
sentences.cn: 他用左手挡住反射过来的阳光。

sentences.en: I saw her sitting at a window table, bathed in sunlight.
sentences.cn: 我看见她坐在靠窗的桌旁，沐浴在阳光中。

sentences.en: Sunlight had broken through the clouds.
Sunlight was streaming into the courtyard.
The bright sunlight made me squint.
sentences.cn: 强烈的阳光刺得我眯起了眼。

sentences.en: The curtains were half drawn to cut out the sunlight.
sentences.cn: 窗帘拉上了一半以遮挡阳光。

sentences.en: The dust whirled and eddied in the sunlight.
sentences.cn: 灰尘在阳光下旋转翻腾。

sentences.en: The fall foliage glowed red and yellow in the morning sunlight.
sentences.cn: 树叶在秋日的晨曦中泛出红黄色的光。

sentences.en: The path was dappled with sunlight.
sentences.cn: 小径上洒下斑斑点点的阳光。

sentences.en: The sunlight is white and blinding, throwing hard-edged shadows on the ground.
sentences.cn: 阳光明亮刺眼，在地上投下轮廓分明的影子。

sentences.en: The trickling stream glistened in the sunlight.
sentences.cn: 涓涓溪流在阳光下闪闪发亮。

sentences.en: The water sparkled in the bright sunlight.
sentences.cn: 水面在灿烂的阳光下闪闪发亮。

trans.tran_en: natural light that comes from the sun
